content: fluffy munchlax baby hat pattern this pattern fits on a 40-50 cm head and is about 25 cm tall it is written in us terminology materials needed - hbd yarn or other similar weight chenille yarn 100g/120m in colors tan teal black and white 321 333 301 311 - a 4 5 mm crochet hook - stitch markers - a darning needle - stuffing disclaimer chenille yarn is not safe for babies without supervision this hat is meant to be used in photos etc under the watch of a responsible adult please don t ever leave your baby unsupervised with chenille works as it may shed and be inhaled or ingested abbreviations single_crochet - single_crochet increase - single_crochet increase double_crochet increase - double_crochet increase chain - chain sl kn - slip know mc - magic_ring st - stich the pattern main - start with the teal yarn 1 mc 8sc 8 2 8inc 16 3 1sc 1inc x8 24 4 2sc 1inc x8 32 5 3sc 1inc x8 40 6 4sc 1inc x8 48 7-17 48sc 48 switch color to tan 18-19 48sc 48 ears make two - teal yarn 1 mc 5sc 5 2 5inc 10 3 1sc 1inc x5 15 4 2sc 1inc x5 20 5 4sc 1inc x4 24 6-14 24sc 24 leave tail for sewing eyes make two - white yarn 1 sl kn ch4 2 in second chain 1sc 1sc 3sc into the last st now crochet on the underside of the beginning chain 1sc 1inc slip_stitch into first single_crochet 8 3 1sc 3inc x2 14 leave tail for sewing assembly 1 stuff the ears and sew them on top on top of the hat there should be about 1 cm space between the two ears 2 sew the teeth on top of the tan rounds of the hat with white yarn 3 sew the eyes and with black yarn add pupils
